info.name: Cleaner Facebook with Montserrat
info.description:
A theme, that makes Facebook a simpler, and more fluent experience.

Main features: The top "bluebar" is white, and the searchbox takes up its full height. Post containers don't have borders, and its edges are curved, as well as dropdown menus'. The default font is Montserrat, imported from the Google font library.

Have fun using this theme! :)
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog

v1.2.3
- Fixed notification buttons not being at the right offset while in non-default state
- Small fixes for better consistency

v1.2.2
- Fixed notification buttons not being at the right offset while in non-default state

v1.2.1
- Fixed container borders appearing due to a Facebook style policy update
- Small fixes for consistency

v1.2.0
 - Dropdown menus now have curved edges
 - Changed page background slightly
 - Fixed background offset of notification buttons
 - Small fixes for consistency

v1.1.1
 - Small fix for remaining unneccessary separator lines

v1.1.0
 - Post containers now have rounded edges
 - Most of the separator lines removed for more simplistic design
 - Reaction buttons are also rounded

v1.0.1
 - Fixed notification buttons appearing white (basically invisible)
 - Fixed main searchbox button not changing style when hovering
